recipe.title: Red Caviar Dip
ingredients: 1 tablespoon plus 1 teaspoon chopped fresh chives
1/4 cup plus 3 tablespoons salmon caviar, drained, gently rinsed
instructions: Mix sour cream, green onions, lemon juice and 1 tablespoon chives in medium bowl. Gently fold in 1/4 cup caviar. Transfer to serving bowl. (Cover and refrigerate at least 6 hours and up to 1 day.)
Sprinkle dip with remaining 1 teaspoon chives and 3 tablespoons caviar.
Sprinkle dip with remaining 1 teaspoon chives and 3 tablespoons caviar.
